meanings.sent1: The doubloon was a shiny gold coin.
meanings.sent2: I found a doubloon in the old pirate chest.
meanings.sent3: The doubloon rolled off the table and into the pirate's pocket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a doubloon in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The doubloon gleamed like a tiny sun in the palm of his hand.

meanings.definition: A gold coin of various countries in the Americas.
meanings.sent1: The doubloon from Mexico was heavier than the others.
meanings.sent2: He collected doubloons from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The doubloon winked at him from the bottom of the fountain.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out like a bag of doubloons falling on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The doubloon jingled in his pocket like a secret melody.
